title: cryptoaddictchie
author: cryptoaddictchie
content: Has anyone seen this announcement? Its about malicious version of the Ledger Connect kit. A lot of users connected to dapps have loss their funds. Has anyone been affectef by this? Ledget tweeted about it. But I have seen the tweets from some users earlier. https://x.com/ledger/status/1735291427100455293

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Similar thread is existing already:IMPORTANT: Ledger ConnectKit Library has been Compromised with a drainer.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Yeah I just got this update at the altcoin section..I think they are one announcementhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5477888.new#newMaybe you can read over there, or do I say op didn't have the post at the right section?
